amendment.description: To support freedom of the press, freedom of speech, freedom of expression, and freedom of assembly in Iran, to support the Iranian people as they seek, receive, and impart information and promote ideas in writing, in print, or through any media without interference, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1775 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1775 proposed by Senator McCain. (consideration: CR S8005-8017; text: CR S8013) To support freedom of the press, freedom of speech, freedom of expression, and freedom of assembly in Iran, to support the Iranian people as they seek, receive, and impart information and promote ideas in writing, in print, or through any media without interference, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1775 proposed by Senator McCain.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1775 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
